ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] New
ygData.msgSnippet: IMO, the only way to really understand the addiction is to play the game. Have you not ever tried it? ... ===== ~~~~~~~~~ And on the eighth day God said, O.K.
ygData.messageBody:
IMO, the only way to really understand the addiction
is to play the game. Have you not ever tried it?

--- danielleheier <danielleheier@...> wrote:

> Hi,
>
> I'm Danielle and I'm quite new with EverQuest. It is
> my husband
> indeed who kind of made me interested in the game on
> the internet as
> he is very good at it and can play hours (when I say
> hours I mean
> LOTS of hours!!!) in a row!! I saw him playing a
> straight 24 hours
> recently.... :) So hopefully this group will help me
> understand the
> addiction it does create!! :)
>
> Thank you!!
>
> Danielle
>
>


=====
~~~~~~~~~

And on the eighth day God said, "O.K. Murphy. You take over."
